User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://autumhire.com/sitemap.xml

# Block access to sensitive areas
Disallow: /admin
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /.env
Disallow: /src/

# Allow social media bots
User-agent: facebookexternalhit
Allow: /

User-agent: Twitterbot
Allow: /

User-agent: LinkedInBot
Allow: /
